text: Craig John Fairbrass (Born 1964) is a British actor from London. He is active as an actor since 1984. He is known as Zeff in Netflix series One Piece based on the manga series by the same name. Since 2007 he is the voice of Simon "Ghost" Reilly in the Call of Duty videogame series. Category:1964 births Category:Actors from London Category:British actors Category:Living people
title: Craig Fairbrass
